about.title: About Us
about.description: Founded in 1937 with its first tender in Istanbul Çamlıca, Ekşioğlu Group has played a pioneering role in construction, banking, automotive, tourism, energy and technology sectors throughout its 88-year heritage. With our global presence extending from Germany to the Middle East, from Ukraine to Africa, we are now a strong family holding consisting of 24 companies. We continue to develop projects that will add value to future generations with our sustainable growth vision.

beginning.title: A Vision, A Beginning
beginning.paragraph1: Founded in 1937 with the vision of contributing to Turkey's rapidly growing economy, Ekşioğlu Group has become one of Turkey's leading holding companies, starting its journey as a small construction firm.
beginning.paragraph2: This journey, which began with our founder's philosophy of "creating value for Turkey", has transformed into a powerful family of group companies operating in six different sectors with half a century of experience.

milestones.title: Foundation and First Steps

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.text1: Cookies are small text files that are saved to your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. Cookies are commonly used to ensure the proper functioning of the website and to improve user experience.
whatAreCookies.text2: Cookies help us remember your preferences, analyze site traffic, and provide you with a better experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to perform basic functions and cannot be disabled.
examples: Session cookies (allow you to navigate between pages)

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: These cookies help us measure the performance of the website and improve user experience.
examples: Number of visitors and page views
Time users spend on the site

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies allow us to remember your preferences and provide you with personalized content.

targeting.title: Targeting/Advertising Cookies
targeting.description: These cookies are used to show you more relevant ads and measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.

managingCookies.title: How Can You Manage Cookies?
managingCookies.text1: Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can refuse or delete cookies from your browser settings. However, if you disable some cookies, some features of the website may not work properly.

browsers.title: Cookie Management in Popular Browsers:
items: Google Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
Mozilla Firefox: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies and Site Data
Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies
Microsoft Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions

thirdParty.title: Third Party Cookies
